Interface WorkerInfoDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
WorkerInfoDAORedisImpl
public interface WorkerInfoDAO
WorkerInfoDAO provides access to information about workers.
Author:
Greg Haines

  • Method Details

    • getWorkerCount

      long getWorkerCount()
      Returns:
      total number of workers known

    • getActiveWorkerCount

      long getActiveWorkerCount()
      Returns:
      number of active workers

    • getPausedWorkerCount

      long getPausedWorkerCount()
      Returns:
      number of paused workers

    • getActiveWorkers

      List<WorkerInfo> getActiveWorkers()
      Returns:
      information about all active workers

    • getPausedWorkers

      List<WorkerInfo> getPausedWorkers()
      Returns:
      information about all paused workers

    • getAllWorkers

      List<WorkerInfo> getAllWorkers()
      Returns:
      information about all workers

    • getWorker

      WorkerInfo getWorker(String workerName)
      Parameters:
      workerName - the name of the worker
      Returns:
      information about the given worker or null if that worker does not exist

    • getWorkerHostMap

      Map<String, List<WorkerInfo>> getWorkerHostMap()
      Returns:
      a map of worker informations by hostname

    • removeWorker

      void removeWorker(String workerName)
      Removes the metadata about a worker.
      Parameters:
      workerName - The worker name to remove
